backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing profiles, posts, comments, reactions, and moderation with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new Tips page routing, UI, navigation, and theming to modified frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of various frontend source files across pages, hooks, components, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes including the new /tips page, uses Suspense and ThemeProvider for layout and theming.
frontend/src/components/admin/AuthorName: Fetches and displays a username for a principal with fallback to a shortened principal string.
frontend/src/components/admin/FlaggedPos: Admin panel listing flagged posts with filtering, sorting, and actions to clear flags using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportedCo: Admin panel listing reported comments with actions to clear reports or delete comments.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportedPo: Admin panel displaying reported posts and allowing report clearing or post deletion.
frontend/src/components/age/AgeAcknowled: Modal gate requiring users to confirm they are 18+ before accessing age‑restricted routes.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth, query cache clearing, and age‑gate reset.
frontend/src/components/comments/Comment: Renders a comment with reporting and reaction actions, showing errors and metadata.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with navigation, authentication gates, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileNav: Slide‑out mobile navigation menu with links based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/components/moderation/Moder: Styled alert component for displaying moderation‑related warning messages.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays a post card with author info, media, reactions, reporting, and deletion actions using various hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Shows a mandatory profile setup dialog for new authenticated users and saves username, bio, and age confirmation.
frontend/src/components/reactions/Reacti: Renders reaction buttons with icons, highlighting the selected reaction and handling pending states.
frontend/src/components/state/QueryState: Provides loading skeletons, error display, empty state, and refresh indicators for query-driven UI.
frontend/src/components/state/RouteChunk: Shows a centered spinner and message while lazy-loaded route chunks are loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendExternalBlo: Converts a backend ExternalBlob for video into a usable URL, preferring direct URLs and managing object URL cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendImageUrl.ts: Generates a URL for image blobs from the backend, using direct URLs or blob URLs with cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns identity and authentication state along with the caller’s user profile query results.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating posts, profiles, admin status, usernames, and auto-refreshing post lists through an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables for light/dark modes, and custom utility classes including gradients and moderation alert styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders admin-only moderation tools, handling authentication and admin checks before showing reported and flagged content panels.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the post feed with auto-refresh, post creation UI, media validation, moderation error handling, and memoized post rendering.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Shows the public landing page with hero content, authentication-aware CTA, and optional content guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Shows a single post with its comments, allows authenticated users to add comments, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: React page for viewing and editing the current user's profile with fields, save logic, and authentication/loader states.
frontend/src/pages/TipsPage.tsx: Static hydration‑tips page displaying a list of daily water‑intake suggestions.
frontend/src/utils/ageGate.ts: LocalStorage‑based age‑acknowledgement utilities and route gating checks.
frontend/src/utils/flaggedPostsView.ts: Helpers for flagged post handling, including reason extraction, media checks, and sorting/filtering utilities.
frontend/src/utils/moderation.ts: Utility functions for detecting moderation‑block errors, extracting readable messages, and categorizing error types.
frontend/src/utils/postImages.ts: Image upload utilities including validation, conversion to backend blobs, preview URL management, and error extraction.
frontend/src/utils/postVideos.ts: Video upload utilities for validation, backend‑format conversion, and preview URL creation and cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session‑stored parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for adding a dedicated Tips page, listing existing features, a new feature request, and meta info like schema and project version.
